amendment.description: Amendment redirects funds to ensure that the Department of Justice continues to fund the NICS at its current $20 million level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $20 million in funding for the Department of Justice, Office of Justice Programs, State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
